subject: Horse Racing
Search and Seizure
Harness Racing
Gambling
lead_paragraph: As many as 30 horse owners, drivers, trainers and gamblers conspired to predetermine the outcome of certain harness races at three Michigan tracks, authorities said.
snippet: As many as 30 horse owners, drivers, trainers and gamblers conspired to predetermine the outcome of certain harness races at three Michigan tracks, authorities said.
